item.title: US(어스) - 지금 이대로

it as I come from

Minutes and days

years of tears

Can’t imagine my vision
that won’t leave
my brain
I’m a scatter minded
Brother Can’t be
sucka attained
you gotta hold
me tight now just hold
me right Baby
your the one that
I need every night yeah
Can’t you see
we were meant to be
I want your baby
Here in eternity.
